Text:
...Cam + German = Same fucked up copy that's missing the first five minutes, and all the Klingon is subtitled into Kraut.

Love to know who was the guy who actually held the camcorder, because *they* deserve the credit and not all these posers posting the same caps and claiming it's their work...

Everyone is a critic. I do believe it says in the title that it is German. Can't read? And, the racist comments about German people are not necessary.

Can't wait to see this awesome copy of the movie that you obviously plan to upload yourself soon.

No? Then STFU.

...In order - or, in your case, that's *odor*:

1) Yeah, I *am* a critic. With professional credentials. Not that I'd reveal them here, of course. You'll just have to accept the fact and deal with it.

2) In your zeal to "put me in my place", you totally missed the fracking point: Every single one of these screeners are from the same godsdamned source! And yet more than a baker's dozen of the screener/ripper groups are claiming it's their original work. How can all of these claim to be the originators when they're ALL MISSING THE FIRST FIVE MINUTES OF THE FILM????

Answer *that* question, Ignatz.

3) I have no intentions of uploading a copy of this film. Deal with it.

4) Blow me. My critique/complaint/argument is valid. So if anyone needs to Shut The Fuck Up - no, you don't get points for laziness via acronyms in this case, kid - it's you. Unless, of course, you've got an honest, valid answer to the question I posed in 2) above.

Not that any of us will hold our breaths in anticipation...

[shakes head in utter disgust at the pathetic egos of the younger generation]

@ ChingaTuu you are not a critic you are a dick so deal with that ass hat, and furthermore I knopw who you are your mother is a whore and you are the product ofd the many men who paid  the 0.50 cents to get inside the whore so shut the fuck up cocksucker.
